keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will guarantee a decent pension rises every year through our triple lock guarantee.
The Lib Dems will cut Income Tax for workers by a further £400 a year to ease the cost of living.
The Lib Dems will guarantee that the NHS budget rises every year by increasing it by £8 billion by 2020.
The Lib Dems will end the stigma of mental health being treated as secondary to physical health.
The Lib Dems will ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher and protect the schools budget.
The Lib Dems will introduce a new Bill to continue tackling climate change and to protect nature.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dem to beat the Conservatives here!
